de.unibw.tspchallenge.core

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unibw.tspchallenge.core.Location

  • public class Location
extends java.lang.Object
    Models a simple location, basically, a 2D-point with an identifier.
    Author:
    tobias
